workshoptitle: AI Services: Introduction to OCI Vision

tutorials.title: Introduction: OCI Vision
tutorials.description: Learn about the features provided by Vision services

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Use Vision Service through the OCI Console
tutorials.description: Learn how to access AI vision using oci console

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a custom model through the OCI Console
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a custom model using the oci console

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Access OCI Vision in DataScience Notebook Session
tutorials.description: Learn how to access OCI Vision in DataScience Notebook Session

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
